DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Monoclonal antibody locate tumor cell either kill deliver tumor-killing substance without harm normal cell . PURPOSE : Phase I trial study effectiveness monoclonal antibody treat patient advanced cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Monoclonal Antibody Therapy Treating Patients With Advanced Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine toxicity associate 4-hour infusion antitransferrin receptor antibodies one antibody administer 1 hour second antibody infusion start . II . Determine pharmacokinetics monoclonal antibody E2.3 A27.15 . OUTLINE : This dose escalate study . Patients receive antitransferrin antibody A27.15 IV 4 hour . One hour initiation A27.15 infusion , infusion antibody E2-3 add IV piggy back . In absence antimouse antibody toxic effect , treatment continue every 4 week patient achieve minimal , partial , complete remission . Treatment cease patient experience stable progressive disease . In absence dose limit toxicity first 3 patient treat , subsequent cohort 6 patient receive escalate dos antitransferrin antibody E2.3 A27.15 dose schedule . If dose limit toxicity occur 2 6 patient give dose level , dose escalation cease next low dose declare MTD . Patients follow 3 week . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : This study accrue 18-27 patient within 2 year .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Refractory recurrent advance malignancy follow know standard effective therapy advance malignancy standard effective therapy exist Measurable evaluable disease PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : 18 Performance status : SWOG 02 Life expectancy : At least 2 month Hematopoietic : Absolute neutrophil count least 1800/mm3 Hematocrit least 30 mg/dL Platelet count least 50,000/mm3 Hepatic : Bilirubin great 1.5 time normal unless due disease , less 3.5 time normal Transaminases le 3 time upper limit normal ( ULN ) ( less 5 time ULN due liver metastasis ) Renal : Creatinine great 2.5 time normal Cardiovascular : No severe cardiac abnormality Must adequate venous access No history sustain ventricular arrhythmia unexplained syncope Pulmonary : No severe pulmonary abnormality Other : Not pregnant nursing Effective contraception require fertile female patient No serious concurrent medical psychiatric illness Adequate nutrition No human antimouse antibodies PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : At least 4 week since prior anticancer therapy recover If disease progression therapy , least 2 week since prior anticancer therapy recover Biologic therapy : Not specify Chemotherapy : No concurrent chemotherapy Endocrine therapy : Concurrent topical steroid use chronic management cutaneous T cell lymphoma allow No concurrent hormone therapy Radiotherapy : No concurrent palliative radiotherapy Surgery : Not specify
